attributes.action: Make school dinners how they were before!
attributes.additional_details: I remeber when I was in school I used to have school meals such as, chocolate cake, pizza, burgers ect... they did used to do healthy things but now at school most of the food is healthy and nothing is even like it used to be as most of the unhealthy stuff have things in them to make them healthy. So I think they should have healthy stuff and unhealthy stuff but the unhealthy stuff should not have healthy things inside of them so there's a wider range of school meals.
attributes.background: Schools used to have a wide range of school meals but now everything is healthy! The food they have now have things inside of them to make them healthy. Before they used to sell things like burgers, chicken nuggets, pizza ect... But now they only sell things like pie and healthier meals.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

The Government sets standards schools must meet about the content of school meals. You can find them here:

https://www.gov.uk/school-meals-healthy-eating-standards

You could start a new petition setting out how you would like these changed.
